event.title: is listed as a census-designated place (CDP) and had a population of 2,887 at the 2010

data.event: The town center is listed as a census-designated place (CDP) and had a population of 2,887 at the 2010 census.
The first people emigrated from England in 1637, and came to the New London and Waterford area (at the time, this land was called West Farms).
